      • getAllTeamReports

        public static java.util.List<AmpReports> getAllTeamReports(java.lang.Long teamId,
                                                           java.lang.Boolean getTabs,
                                                           java.lang.Integer currentPage,
                                                           java.lang.Integer reportPerPage,
                                                           java.lang.Boolean inlcludeMemberReport,
                                                           java.lang.Long memberId,
                                                           java.lang.String name,
                                                           java.lang.Long reportCategoryId)
        Returns TeamLeader Reports. Returns all reports from amp_team_reports table for specified team, or all reaports if team is managment team.
        Parameters:
        teamId - db id of the team
        getTabs - when true - gets only reports marked as desktop tabs, when false - gets only reports NOT marked as desktop tabs, when null - gets all reports
        currentPage - page start - can be null
        reportPerPage - number of reports on page - can be null
        Returns:
        list of AmpReports objects
